chapters.title: Chapter 39: A Visit from Verin Sedai
chapters.info: Velina Behar, p. 608—Sitter for the White Ajah in Tar Valon. She is cool and precise, has an almost girlishly high-pitched voice, a beak of a nose, and sharp, tilted eyes. She is a model of a White sister. Verin's work revealed that she is of the Black Ajah. She escaped Egwene's justice. Editor's note: Velina flinched when Alviarin glared at her in The Path of Daggers.
